Marine Transportation

  • Modes of sea freight shipping:FCL (Full Container Load), LCL (Less than a Container Load) and FCX (Full Container Consolidated) transportations. At PORTGATE we have established communications with all of the primary ocean liners, to offer a wide range of import and export sea freight services that cater to our customersâ€™ needs..

Advantages:

  • Ideal for transporting heavy and bulky goods
  • Suitable for products with long lead times
  • Quite cheap transport channel

Ocean freight is the most favored form of cargo transportation for those looking for a cost-effective solution. PORTGATE operates in all major Black Sea and Caspian seaports via its representative offices. In collaboration with our international agents, we carefully handle each step of the maritime transport chain, from loading to unloading, up to customs clearance and other maritime services. With our global network of partners, we can cater to the specific needs of our clients to and from any location around the world. We can get in touch with your suppliers directly and take stress off your hands and if required we can also consolidate your cargo from multiple suppliers before it leaves the origin port of that country

Marine freight service shortlist

  • Cargo transportation by all type containerscargoes
  • Optimal multimodal transportation
  • Warehouse services
  • Transit cargoes in the Black and Caspian Sea ports
  • Full monitoring of the cargo movement and tracking information
  • Customs clearance service

ABOUT PORTGATE

Since 1999 PORTGATE carries out all kinds of international cargo transportation mainly in the Caucasus region, Central Asia and the CIS countries. The majority of the transportations are completed through the TRACECA corridor.
